name: Aether Chronicles: Engineer of Time
description:
In a world powered by a mysterious substance called Aether, you play as an engineer who has crafted a powerful Aether Clock that allows you to travel back in time and witness the past. As you journey through the Aetherpunk world, you discover that the past holds the key to solving the puzzles and mysteries of the present. But be warned, meddling with the past can have unintended consequences, and your actions can have a ripple effect across time and space. Will you use your engineering skills and knowledge of the past to save the future, or will you inadvertently bring about its destruction? The fate of the world is in your hands in this time-traveling adventure.

Created for Finnish College Jam #4

Theme: Aetherpunk

Diversifiers: Time Manipulation

Controls:

WASD Move
Mouse Scroll to zoom in and out
Space to jump
E to Interact & Pickup/Drop objects
F to use Time Warp ability
